value.name: How Dreasjon Reed, McHale Rose are being remembered a year after they were shot by police
value.description: As Indianapolis reflects on the deaths of Dreasjon Reed and McHale Rose one year later, Indy10 Black Lives Matter is hosting a week of action to remember the fatal police shootings. Both men were ...

value.name: Sisters of Atatiana Jefferson say one year after George Floyd’s death they remain 'stuck in 2019'
value.description: Ashley and Amber Carr are still waiting on a trial for the former Fort Worth police officer charged with murder in their sister’s death.

video.name: Sisters of Atatiana Jefferson say one year after George Floyd’s death they remain 'stuck in 2019'

value.name: One year after George Floyd’s death, what’s changed for HR?
value.description: In the aftermath of George Floyd's murder, organizations ramped up their diversity and inclusion initiatives, but have they succeeded in moving the needle on racial injustice?

value.name: IMPD has gotten 123 requests for body camera footage. Here's how they've responded.
value.description: Indianapolis police have been using body cameras for nine months. Here's how and when IMPD has released footage of police shootings.

video.name: A look at the body-worn cameras IMPD officers are now wearing

value.name: Speaker Series In Dallas Marks 1-Year Anniversary Of George Floyd’s Murder
value.description: Floyd's death last May sparked months of rallies and protests worldwide against police brutality and systemic racism.

video.name: Tuesday Is 1 Year Since George Floyd's Murder

value.name: No charges against Indianapolis police in Black man's death
value.description: McHale Rose, 19, was fatally shot May 7 after he called 911 to falsely report a burglary at an apartment on the city’s north side. He was armed with an AK-47-style semiautomatic rifle at the ...

value.name: Protests as Indianapolis police kill 3 in separate incidents
value.description: The Marion County Coroner’s office identified the man killed in the first shooting as Dreasjon Reed, 21, and the man killed later as McHale Rose, 19. Both men were black. The pregnant woman was identified as Ashlynn Lisby, 23. Lisby was white.

value.name: 110 Black Men And Boys Killed By Police
